text:
The original ClearCase task author (Curtis White), Rob Anderson and myself have 
created 6 new ClearCase tasks that greatly increase the useability of ClearCase 
within ant by adding the tasks to utilize the cleartool lock, unlock, 
mklbltype, mklabel, rmlabel, and mkbl commands. These tools help facilitate 
labeling and baselining releases as well as freezing code while doing 
deployments.

We would really like to see these included in the next release of ant. Attached 
is a diff against ant 1.5.1 that contains these changes.

This bug should probably supercede 
http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=13222 as these include 
versions of those tasks, plus  a few more.

Thanks,
Sean
